nodes.bodyText:
please remove it from here.
this module do not report any violations now, so it should not be there.
Module will never report violations, Xpath will never be able to suppress violations from it.
UT might be complaining on absent module, so we need to update UT to skip skip module from consideration as it has no violations, so no need to have support of Xpath for it.

This should be moved to something else as the check will never have xpath support. It doesn't create violations.
I would create a new field for it that specifically says they will not have xpath support ever, and give a reason why for this check.

@rnveach Thanks, You are right
Once you create the new field I will rebase and move it to the new field
@AmrDeveloper I was referring to as if I was working the PR myself. You should make the changes as part of your PR.
As part of this PR, you need to update UT to skip such module at all.

NO_VIOLATION_MODULES
All Checks must have violations.

please remove comment with "till".
"till" means .... when such issue become closed, we can remove code below.
But it is the same issue as you fix. Such block of code will exists till we remove SuppressWarningsHolder from repo, we do not have issue on this for now, it is far future.
please remove MSG_KEY from module, it should not be used any more.

please remove comment, I do not understand it. Exception will fail whole Checkstyle execution, it is not validation, any Check can throw exception. Or make comment // No messages in just module
Please try to remove SuppressWarningsHolder from getCheckstyleChecks return, if there a lot of other changes(please share them here) are required then lets keep it and we will create new issue on this and address separately.

Ok, lets do this in separate PR , new issue #8121 .
You are welcome to fix it as you know all details.
